main_banner.title: PUBG MOBILE CLUB OPEN 2020
main_banner.subtitle: SEASON ZERO
main_banner.description: The PUBG MOBILE Club Open 2020 is a global tournament for PUBG MOBILE esports teams. The tournament will feature 16 teams from each region, with the top 8 teams from each region advancing to the PMCO 2020 Finals. The PMCO 2020 Finals will be held in Berlin, Germany, with a prize pool of $2,000,000 USD.
